name: AVCaptionRenderer.Scene
desc: An object that holds a time range and an associated state which indicates when the renderer draws output.

items.name: var timeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time range during which the system doesnâ€™t modify the scene.

items.name: var hasActiveCaptions: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the scene contains one or more active captions.

items.name: var needsPeriodicRefresh: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the scene requires redrawing while your app progresses through the content.
